lbl_freeplay_sentence.text: You have %freePlayCounter% FREE PLAYS at %freePlayStake% Stake

lbl_slot_machine_sentence.text: Select the GOLDEN CHIP icon anytime to Play

lbl_RealityCheckText.text:
You have requested Reality Check every 
 % minutes of game play.Your gaming session 
 has now reached % minutes

lbl_NetworkErrorMsg.text:
You've lost connection to the Game Server. 
 Please re-launch the game and try again.

lbl_ConnectionLossErrorMsg.text:
Security is important to us. As you have been 
 inactive for some time we have automatically 
 logged you out of your Game Session.

lbl_ShowBrokenPopUpText.text:
We recognize a previous game did not 
 complete. We will now resume the game ready 
 for you to continue.

lbl_GameOnIEBrowserErrorMsg.text:
We have detected that you are playing game on IE11 browser 
 which may cause some sound issues in the game, we recommend 
 you to play this game on mainstream browsers for best 
 experience.

lbl_GameOnUCBrowserErrorMsg.text:
We have detected that you are playing game on UC browser 
 which may cause some sound issues in the game, we recommend you to play 
 this game on mainstream browsers for best experience.

lbl_GameOnUnSupportedDevicesErrorMsg.text: We have detected that you are loading game on iPad2 which is not compatible device to run this game, kindly switch to the higher version device for better experience of this game.
